meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Robin Harkleroad Sue Wulfestieg Barbara-Anne Eddy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #792.

div.div:
Barbara-Anne Eddy game 2.
Final Jeopardy! logo flashes on the game board's monitors instead of the show's logo.

td.p: Robin Harkleroad, a banker from Bakersfield, California
Sue Wulfestieg, a homemaker from Tacoma, Washington
Barbara-Anne Eddy, a freelance researcher from Vancouver, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,200)

tr.td: TECHNOLOGY
LONDON MONUMENTS
BOTTOMS UP
HITS OF THE '80s
ACTORS OF THE PAST
"UN" WORDS

')

RobinWhat is 19878?

$500
10,000 (for Minnesota, \"The Land of 10,000 Lakes\")')

Sue
Robin
2-day champion: $21,700 + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! computer game
2nd place: Soundesign deluxe audio/video center & Sam Moore Furniture wing chair + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! computer game
3rd place: Frigidaire refrigerator/freezer + either the Jeopardy! box game or Jeopardy! computer game
Barbara-Anne
Sue
Robin

29 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

1 W
